#include "../deptran/__dep__.h"
#include "server.h"
#include "../deptran/raft/server.h"
#include "client.h"
#include <mutex>
#include <string>

namespace janus {

  std::mutex mtxc; 
  std::recursive_mutex mtx1_{};

static int volatile x1 =
    MarshallDeputy::RegInitializer(MarshallDeputy::CMD_MULTI_STRING,
                                     [] () -> Marshallable* {
                                       return new MultiStringMarshallable;
                                     });

int64_t KvServer::GetNextOpId() {
  verify(sp_log_svr_);
  int64_t ret = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  ret = ret << 32;
  ret = ret + op_id_cnt_++; 
  return ret;
}

int KvServer::Put(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  const string& v) {
  /* 
  Your are recommended to use MultiStringMarshallable as the format 
  for the log entries. Here is an example how you can use it.
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(op_id));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  */
  /* your code here */
  //mtxc.lock();
  std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock123(mtx1_);
  Log_info("put");
  data.put_ack=false;
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("put");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  string opid= to_string(oid);
  //svr_->Start();
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd=s;
  RaftServer &ser= GetRaftServer();
  uint64_t index=0; 
  uint64_t term=0;
  bool a=false;
  std::cout<<"value of oid "<<opid<<endl;
  Coroutine::CreateRun([&](){
   a=ser.Start(cmd,&index,&term);
  }); 
  int timeout=400*1000;
  while(timeout>0){
    rrr::Coroutine::Sleep(10000);
    timeout-=10000;
    if(ack.find(opid) != ack.end()){
      break;
    }
  }
  //rrr::Coroutine::Sleep(400*1000);
  if(!a)
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  else if(ack.find(opid) != ack.end()) { 
    //std::cout<<"key : "<<k<<" value : "<< v<<" success: "<<db[k]<<endl;
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  else{
    //std::cout<<"key : "<<k<<" value : "<< v<<" timeout"<<endl;
     ack[opid]=1;
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
  
}

int KvServer::Append(const uint64_t& oid, 
                     const string& k,
                     const string& v) {
  /* your code here */
  std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock1(mtx1_);
  data.append_ack=false;
  Log_info("append");
  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("append");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back(v);
  string opid= to_string(oid);
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd=s;
  RaftServer &ser= GetRaftServer();
  uint64_t index=0;
  uint64_t term=0;
  bool a=false;
  Coroutine::CreateRun([&](){
   a=ser.Start(cmd,&index,&term);
  });
  int timeout=400*1000;
  while(timeout>0){
    rrr::Coroutine::Sleep(10000);
    timeout-=10000;
    if(ack.find(opid) != ack.end()){
      break;
    }
  }
  //rrr::Coroutine::Sleep(400*1000);
  if(!a)
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  else if(ack.find(opid) != ack.end()) { 
    //std::cout<<"append key : "<<k<<" value : "<< v<<" success: "<<db[k]<<endl;
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  else{
    //std::cout<<"append key : "<<k<<" value : "<< v<<" timeout"<<endl;
    ack[opid]=1;
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
 
}

int KvServer::Get(const uint64_t& oid, 
                  const string& k,
                  string* v) {
  /* your code here */
  //mtxc.lock();
  std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lock(mtx1_);
  data.get_ack=false;
  Log_info("get");
  std::cout<<"value to retreat k :"<< k <<endl;


  auto s = make_shared<MultiStringMarshallable>();
  s->data_.push_back(to_string(oid));
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  s->data_.push_back(k);
  s->data_.push_back("get");
  string opid= to_string(oid);
  shared_ptr<Marshallable> cmd=s;
  RaftServer &ser= GetRaftServer();
  uint64_t index=0;
  bool a=false;
  bool isleader=false;
  uint64_t term=-1;
  Coroutine::CreateRun([&](){
    a = ser.Start(cmd,&index,&term);
  });
  int timeout=400*1000;
  while(timeout>0){
    rrr::Coroutine::Sleep(10000);
    timeout-=10000;
    if(ack.find(opid) != ack.end()){
      break;
    }
  }
  //rrr::Coroutine::Sleep(400*1000);
  if(!a){
    return KV_NOTLEADER;
  }
  else if(ack.find(opid) != ack.end()){
    *v=db[k];
    //std::cout<<"value to retreat k :"<< k << " completed"<<" value: "<<db[k] <<endl;
    return KV_SUCCESS;
  }
  else{
     ack[opid]=1;
    return KV_TIMEOUT;
  }
 
}

void KvServer::OnNextCommand(Marshallable& m) {
  //std::lock_guard<std::recursive_mutex> lockq(mtx1_);


  auto v = (MultiStringMarshallable*)(&m);
  string opid=v->data_[0];
  string op=v->data_[1];
  string key=v->data_[2];
  string value=v->data_[3];
  if(ack.find(opid) != ack.end()){
    return ;
  }
  ack[opid]=1;
  if(op=="put"){
    //std::cout<< op <<" "<<key<<" "<<value<<" "; 
    //db.insert({key,value});
    db[key]=value;
    // std::cout<<"line 164 next cmd k : "<<key<<" value : "<< db[key]<<" original value: "<<value <<endl;
     Log_info("database size %d",db.size());
  }
  else if(op=="append"){
    //std::cout<< op <<" "<<key<<" "<<value<<" "; 
    if(db.count(key)==0){
      db[key]=value;
    }
    else{
      db[key]=db[key]+value;
    }
     Log_info("append database size %d",db.size());
  }
 
  
  //std::cout<<"value of oid in nxtcmd "<<opid<<endl;
  //std::cout<<"next cmd k : "<<key<<" value : "<< db[key]<<endl;
  
  /* your code here */
  //   std::cout<<"...key: "<<k<<" expected value: "<<v1+v2<<" received :"<<v3<<endl;
}

//------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------->

shared_ptr<KvClient> KvServer::CreateClient() {
  /* don't change this function */
  auto cli = make_shared<KvClient>();
  verify(commo_ != nullptr);
  cli->commo_ = commo_;
  uint32_t id = sp_log_svr_->site_id_;
  id = id << 16;
  cli->cli_id_ = id+cli_cnt_++; 
  return cli;
}

} // namespace janus;
